lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hmm... There weren't any Power Trainger events in town this week either.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Where could Tai have gone?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait... That burgundy vest...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: TAI!!!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: TAI PERRY RIDER!!!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Hm? Oh Locke, hey.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What the heck Tai?! I've been looking all over for you!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's like you dropped off the face of the earth!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Did you see my messages? Where have you been?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well, there was a convention in the next town over that was holding a Power Traingers event.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: So I drove over the weekend to check it out.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And you didn't tell me?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I thought you didn't like going to those events alone. I could have gone with you!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well... I...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I didn't think you would have wanted to come.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What do you mean? How long have we been friends for Tai?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I've gone to all those events with you before, why wouldn't I go to this one?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: ...I guess I just didn't know how to ask.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: You're usually the one who initiates our hangouts. And I...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I know you only go to those events for me... Not because you really like Power Traingers.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I thought you might get sick of accompanying me all the time.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Tai , you've always been there for me through all my wild ideas and semi-illegal schticks.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You even supported me when I told everyone that I wanted to start a detective agency, despite how completely financially impractical it was.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well, I admired you for it. You were never afraid to do things your way.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Exactly! You actually trust and appreciate me!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You don't think I'd do the same for you?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Locke... I...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I don't have any friends.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I-I mean, aside from you of course!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: But besides you, there's no one... who would actually want to hang out with me.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What about your coworkers or clients? Haven't you gone out for drinks with them before?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I did... At first.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I mean, I get along with my coworkers just fine.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: They're all very nice people, but they all ended up becoming friends with each other and...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I didn't know how to join.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hm...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Have you ever tried approaching your coworkers yourself?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Like you do with me, "Hey, do you want to try the new Froggo Donuts at the library cafe?"

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm sure someone would have said yes.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I-I'm not like you Locke... I could never just bring myself to walk up to someone new...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: And just ask.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: For one thing, I'm glad to hear you finally consult me about something.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well you always listen to me rant about about stuff.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Like the time Keyna first moved here, or when that old lady forced me to search for her cat for an entire week.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You rarely talk about yourself.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It made me think that you somehow just always had your life together...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Or maybe that I wasn't a very reliable friend.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm a detective. I've seen plenty of strange cases and managed to solve them all somehow.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But to think my biggest and hardest case...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Was not being there for you.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Locke...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Anyways, I was pretty happy when you talked to me about your editing job.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You're a good editor, y'know? And you always have interesting stuff to say.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm sure that if you can muster up more confidence in yourself, you'll be able to make plenty of friends!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But one step at a time, of course.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And I'll still always be here as a friend who will support you.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: ...One step at a time huh?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And you're wrong about one thing, Power Traingers is a great show.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Where else did you think I got the inspiration for my awesome pose?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Sure, I might not love Trainger Yellow to the point that I would want to marry the actor.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But I really have fun going with you to those events.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Especially because I get to share them with you, Tai.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Haha... And here I thought you were getting sick of me.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I'm sorry that I doubted you... Doubted our friendship...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I'm glad we talked about this, Locke.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I guess I just didn't know how to bring myself to say it but...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I care about you a lot too.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: ...Did you know?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: During the convention, they announced the new season of Power Traingers.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: It's going to be detective themed. The Traingers are going to be detectives that solve train trafficking incidents.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh seriously?! That sounds awesome!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Maybe we can get Keyna to watch with us as well. I bet she'd make the perfect Trainger Blue.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Would she be interested? We can form the Trainger Trio if that's the case!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: HEH, I have my ways...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: She still owes me for helping to find her house key last time.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well I wouldn't want to force her to join us.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Maybe...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I'll try and ask Keyna?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh if you're comfortable with that! You've met each other before, right?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And it'll probably go a lot better thnan me blackmailing- err I mean, asking her myself.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Haha we'll see.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: But thanks, Locke.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Anytime, buddy!
